name: Sy Fall Off Cliff Simulator
description:
This game is the best simulator ever made that was coincidentally released on April 1st, and it is the most accurate simulator about jumping off a cliff.

Get Sy to jump off a cliff in order to get score and unlock new characters!

Wow!

Absolutely no hacks. Don't type in hack please. Please. Don't. You ruin the game.

Support for Mac and both Windows versions (sorry Linux).

Not part of Comet's story.

CONTROLS:

Left and Right arrow keys - move left and right obviously

Up arrow key - jump

There is only one bug and that bug is irrelevant.

If you actually downloaded this, thank you. This is a very bad joke of a game and I appreciate you checking it out. Trust me, I have WAY better games. Like, the whole of the Comet series that is currently out.

This game was developed in Snap!
